attributes.action: Make schools teach pronouns(No matter the age)
attributes.background: I want all schools to teach children all pronouns like "They/them" "She/they,They/she" "He/they, They/she" and so on, So people who use these pronouns or don't use "normal" pronouns don't feel invalidated.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you would like pronouns that are used to identify individuals taught in schools but it is unclear what action you would like the Government to take to make that happen. We could accept a petition calling for the use of identity pronouns to be included in the national curriculum or within already existing areas of the national curriculum. 

If you do start a petition, you'll need to include a full name.
